Detailed Description

Implementaion of LogFormatter interface for plain text format

Instance of PlainText is immutable and threadsafe

Requirements:

  • Standard ANSI C++, 32-bit compiler

Copyright © 1997, Company, Inc. All rights reserved.

Author:
isearch1
Date:
03-29-2010
Version:
1.0.0

Member Function Documentation

std::string com::afrigis::util::logsystem::PlainText::getIntroFormat (  ) 

Any fresh device will write any message return by this method before writing any log message. HTML or XML type log formatter should use this method for proper intro text, like for HTML it may return something like this: "<html><head><title>This is Log Title</title></heaD><body>"

Returns:
initial string for any fresh device

std::string com::afrigis::util::logsystem::PlainText::getFinalFormat (  ) 

Logger will write any text return by this method if the current device was used for logging any message.

Returns:
final string to the device
